model.parser

Class EarthQuakesParser

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.parser.AbstractDataParser<T>
      • model.parser.AbstractXML<EarthQuakeEntry>
        • model.parser.EarthQuakesParser
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DataParser<EarthQuakeEntry>

    public class EarthQuakesParser
extends AbstractXML<EarthQuakeEntry>

    EarthQuakesParser

    parses the XML format files of USGS earthquakes data site that makes Live RSS Feed about earthquakes for past hour, day, week and month. Should be instansiated using DataParserBuilder class only
    Since:
    21/7/2019
    See Also:
    AbstractXML, AbstractDataParser, DataParser, EarthQuakeEntry

    • Method Detail

      • parse

        public EarthQuakesParser parse()
        parses the RSS FEED and should be the first method to be used. in the class, uses the input source made in initialization and parses it using the public inherited method .getSource(), using Xerces XML Parser Makes a Node element of entry (which is the main Node that holds all the info of each line or input in file) and using that Entry node, gets the title,location,depth,Age using their respected tag names in the RSS feed file and makes a EarthQuakeEntry Pojo Object using these data putting each one in a List of entries that is inhertied from hierarchy using the inherited using the method .addPojo(T pojo), T in that case is EarthQuakeEntry because we extend the AbstractXML
        Returns:
        Same EarthQuakesParser object used for API Flexibility to use Aggregate Operations, null if an un-handled exception happens
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if null is sent to it.
